methane.Sources: Production-stage methane emissions for natural gas use in each state, normalized by consumption, are from Burns & Grubert (2021). Other segment estimates are from a national bottom-up assessment of methane emissions in the U.S. from Alvarez et al. (2018)

scroll_chiller.References: Typical refrigerant, low-GWP refrigerant, typical annual leakage, and EOL leakage: Hwang, 2016 (https://iifiir.org/en/fridoc/harmonization-of-life-cycle-climate-performance-methodology-139940); Phase-out year: U.S. Environmental Protection Agency, 2016 (https://www.epa.gov/sites/default/files/2016-12/documents/snap_action_scr2_factsheet.pdf); Typical charge: TBD
